authors: Robin Ruff, Patrick Reiser, Jan Stühmer, Pascal Friederich
bibtex_refs: @misc{ruff2023connectivity, title={Connectivity Optimized Nested Graph Networks for Crystal Structures}, author={Robin Ruff and Patrick Reiser and Jan Stühmer and Pascal Friederich}, year={2023}, eprint={2302.14102}, archivePrefix={arXiv}, primaryClass={cs.LG}}
notes: We found that there is a strong interdependency between crystal preprocessing for GNNs and GNN architectures. Our model 'coNGN' was optimized with respect to both aspects and further adds nested line graphs.
